control.visible: [SubString(MusicPlayer.Artist,f,Left) | SubString(MusicPlayer.Artist,w,Left) | SubString(MusicPlayer.Artist,i,Left) | SubString(MusicPlayer.Artist,1,Left) | SubString(MusicPlayer.Artist,2,Left) | SubString(MusicPlayer.Artist,3,Left) | SubString(MusicPlayer.Artist,4,Left) | SubString(MusicPlayer.Artist,5,Left)] + Skin.HasSetting(cdartinvis) + !Skin.HasSetting(vinylart)

[SubString(MusicPlayer.Artist,h,Left) | SubString(MusicPlayer.Artist,z,Left) | SubString(MusicPlayer.Artist,q,Left) | SubString(MusicPlayer.Artist,x,Left) | SubString(MusicPlayer.Artist,y,Left) | SubString(MusicPlayer.Artist,6,Left) | SubString(MusicPlayer.Artist,7,Left) | SubString(MusicPlayer.Artist,8,Left) | SubString(MusicPlayer.Artist,9,Left) | SubString(MusicPlayer.Artist,0,Left)] + Skin.HasSetting(cdartinvis) + !Skin.HasSetting(vinylart)

[SubString(MusicPlayer.Artist,da,Left) | SubString(MusicPlayer.Artist,de,Left) | SubString(MusicPlayer.Artist,di,Left) | SubString(MusicPlayer.Artist,do,Left) | SubString(MusicPlayer.Artist,du,Left) | SubString(MusicPlayer.Artist,d',Left) | SubString(MusicPlayer.Artist,dr,Left) | SubString(MusicPlayer.Artist,dy,Left) | SubString(MusicPlayer.Artist,dh,Left) | SubString(MusicPlayer.Artist,dj,Left) | SubString(MusicPlayer.Artist,dw,Left)] + Skin.HasSetting(cdartinvis) + !Skin.HasSetting(vinylart)

control.label: $INFO[MusicPlayer.BitRate,,[COLOR white] kbps | [/COLOR]]$INFO[MusicPlayer.SampleRate,,[COLOR white] kHz |[/COLOR] ]$INFO[MusicPlayer.bitspersample,,[COLOR white] bit | [/COLOR] ]$INFO[MusicPlayer.Channels,,[COLOR white] $LOCALIZE[31629] [/COLOR]]
